english.segment1: Either you'll give in. Or I'll give up. It's haunted mystery. Ever since the beginning. My time
english.segment2: You need my kidney. Will I be your donor?. I think it's my delight. The joy of starting over. My time
english.segment3: This haunted mystery. Keeps creeping all over me. So many surprises. Too many disguises. My time. It's a haunted mystery
